resources.string: 1. Canberra is the capital of Australia.
2. The Pacific Ocean is larger than the Atlantic Ocean.
3. The Suez Canal connects the Red Sea and the Indian Ocean.
4. The source of the Nile River is in Egypt.
5. The Amazon River is the longest river in the Americas.
6. Lake Baikal is the world\'s oldest and deepest freshwater lake.
Are you sure you want to do this?
Are you sure you want a hint?
A resident of Canberra is known as a Canberran.
There are more fish in the pacific ocean
The Suez Canal Connects two seas.
You can buy many books on the amazon website
Lake Ontario is one of the five Great Lakes
